page.title: 06Ombersley Transport Data
page.content:
We took a{count}of the vehicles passing along the A449 Worcester to Kidderminster road and the A4133 Ombersley to Droitwich road on 21.5.85 between 10.15a.m. and 10.25a.m.. On the A449 144 vehicles passed, on the A4133 35 passed.
We went outside to collect car numbers so that we could tell the{age they were by looking at the last letter which shows the year they were registered. The average age of 50 cars turned out to be 5.1 years.
We counted the different{sorts of {vehicles}and found that the A443 carried 49 cars, 10 lorries and 16 vans in 15 minutes. There was one pedestrian.All the vehicles were diesel or petrol engined. No buses, bikes or tractors passed in this time.
